workshoptitle: Monitor Public Transportation using GoldenGate Stream Analytics

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Prepare Setup
tutorials.description: How to download your ORM stack and update security rules for an existing VCN.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Setup Compute Instance
tutorials.description: How to provision the workshop environment and connect to it

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Initialize Environment
tutorials.description: How to initialize and start all the workshop components

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Create Artifacts for Your Stream Analytics Pipeline
tutorials.description: How to create Artifacts for Your Stream Analytics Pipeline to monitor public transport in a specifed region,

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Build a Stream Analytics Pipeline
tutorials.description: How to build a Stream Analytics Pipeline to monitor public transport in a specifed region,

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Add Business Rules to Your Stream Analytics Pipeline
tutorials.description: How to Add Business Rules to Your Stream Analytics Pipeline, to monitor public transport in a specifed region,

tutorials.title: Lab 7: Add a Database Reference to Your Stream Analytics Pipeline
tutorials.description: How to Add a Database Reference to Your Stream Analytics Pipeline,

tutorials.title: Lab 8: Configure Graphical Views in your Stream Analytics Pipeline
tutorials.description: How to configure Graphical Views in your Stream Analytics Pipeline,

tutorials.title: Lab 9: Define a Target in your Stream Analytics Pipeline
tutorials.description: How to define a Target in your Stream Analytics Pipeline,

tutorials.title: Lab 10: Publish the Stream Analytics Pipeline
tutorials.description: How to Publish your Stream Analytics Pipeline,

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
